languages.text: {n}Музыкант прерывает игру и разводит руками, виновато улыбаясь.{/n} "Так на работу не берут уже которую смену. А если и возьмут — блюстители потом обдерут до нитки. Вот я и нашел работу по нраву — меняю пайковые талоны на удачу. В местных лавках торгуют тем, что в избытке. Чем же я хуже?" {n}Народ осторожно поддакивает.{/n}
languages.translation_comment: здесь нужно отключить флейту и анимацию игры на флейте
здесь нужно отключить флейту и анимацию игры на флейте

languages.text: {n}The man stops playing and shrugs, a guilty smile crossing his face.{/n} "I haven't had work for who knows how many watches now. And even if they did give me work, the enforcers would just rob me of my earnings afterward. So I've found a calling after my own heart: I trade fortune for ration cards. The folks around here peddle away what little they have to spare, anyway, so why can't I?" {n}The crowd echoes his words in cautious agreement.{/n}

Вот я и нашел работу по нраву — меняю пайковые талоны на удачу. В местных лавках торгуют тем, что в избытке. Чем же я хуже?" {n}Народ осторожно поддакивает.{/n}

languages.text: {n}L'homme cesse de jouer et hausse les épaules avec un sourire coupable.{/n} « Voilà bien longtemps que je n'ai pas été embauché. Et même si on me donnait du boulot, mon salaire finirait dans la poche des prévôts. Alors, j'ai choisi une autre voie. Maintenant, je troque la fortune contre des tickets de rationnement. Après tout, ici, tout le monde revend le peu qu'il possède, alors pourquoi pas moi ? » {n}Vous sentez dans la foule une vague d'approbation, bien que prudente.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The man stops playing and shrugs, a guilty smile crossing his face.{/n} "I haven't had work for who knows how many watches now. And even if they did give me work, the enforcers would just rob me of my earnings afterward. So I've found a calling after my own heart: I trade fortune for ration cards. The folks around here peddle away what little they have to spare, anyway, so why can't I?" {n}The crowd echoes his words in cautious agreement.{/n}

languages.text: {n}El hombre deja de tocar y se encoge de hombros, esbozando una sonrisa culpable.{/n} «He perdido la cuenta del número de ciclos que llevo sin trabajar. Y aunque me ofreciesen trabajo, los guardias se limitarían a robarme el salario después. Así que he hallado mi verdadera vocación: cambio azar por tarjetas de racionamiento. Aquí todo el mundo se dedica a malvender sus escasas pertenencias para subsistir, ¿por qué no iba yo a hacer lo mismo?». {n}La muchedumbre confirma sus palabras asintiendo con cautela.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The man stops playing and shrugs, a guilty smile crossing his face.{/n} "I haven't had work for who knows how many watches now. And even if they did give me work, the enforcers would just rob me of my earnings afterward. So I've found a calling after my own heart: I trade fortune for ration cards. The folks around here peddle away what little they have to spare, anyway, so why can't I?" {n}The crowd echoes his words in cautious agreement.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El hombre deja de tocar y se encoge de hombros, esbozando una sonrisa culpable.{/n} «He perdido la cuenta del número de ciclos que llevo sin trabajar. Y aunque me ofreciesen trabajo, los guardias se limitarían a robarme el salario después. Así que he hallado mi verdadera vocación: cambio azar por tarjetas de racionamiento. Aquí todo el mundo se dedica a malvender sus escasas pertenencias para subsistir, ¿por qué no iba yo a hacer lo mismo?». {n}La muchedumbre confirma sus palabras asintiendo con cautela.{/n}

languages.text: {n}男は演奏する手を止めて肩をすくめ、バツが悪そうに笑みを浮かべる。{/n}「もう時計いくつ分、仕事をしていないでしょう。仮に仕事を与えていただけても、後からエンフォーサーに稼ぎを奪われるだけです。だから私は自分の心の赴くままに天職を見つけました。配給カードと財産を取引するのです。この辺の連中は、なけなしの金で商売しているのですよ」{n}群衆は男の言葉に控えめに同調する。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The man stops playing and shrugs, a guilty smile crossing his face.{/n} "I haven't had work for who knows how many watches now. And even if they did give me work, the enforcers would just rob me of my earnings afterward. So I've found a calling after my own heart: I trade fortune for ration cards. The folks around here peddle away what little they have to spare, anyway, so why can't I?" {n}The crowd echoes his words in cautious agreement.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}男は演奏する手を止めて肩をすくめ、バツが悪そうに笑みを浮かべる。{/n}「もう時計いくつ分、仕事をしていないでしょう。仮に仕事を与えていただけても、後からエンフォーサーに稼ぎを奪われるだけです。だから私は自分の心の赴くままに天職を見つけました。配給カードと財産を取引するのです。この辺の連中は、なけなしの金で商売しているのですよ」{n}群衆は男の言葉に控えめに同調する。{/n}

languages.text: {n}吹笛人停止了演奏，耸了耸肩，脸上掠过一丝内疚的微笑。{/n}“我已经不知道多少巡没工作过了。就算那些人真的能给我一份工作，等工作结束之后，他们也会把我赚来的东西抢走。既然如此，我就不如遵从内心的呼唤吧。我给别人带来好运，以此换取配给卡。反正这里的其他人也把他们仅有的一点点财产花光了，我凭什么不能这么做呢？”{n}周围的人谨慎地附和着他的话。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The man stops playing and shrugs, a guilty smile crossing his face.{/n} "I haven't had work for who knows how many watches now. And even if they did give me work, the enforcers would just rob me of my earnings afterward. So I've found a calling after my own heart: I trade fortune for ration cards. The folks around here peddle away what little they have to spare, anyway, so why can't I?" {n}The crowd echoes his words in cautious agreement.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}吹笛人停止了演奏，耸了耸肩，脸上掠过一丝内疚的微笑。{/n}“我已经不知道多少巡没工作过了。就算那些人真的能给我一份工作，等工作结束之后，他们也会把我赚来的东西抢走。既然如此，我就不如遵从内心的呼唤吧。我给别人带来好运，以此换取配给卡。反正这里的其他人也把他们仅有的一点点财产花光了，我凭什么不能这么做呢？”{n}周围的人谨慎地附和着他的话。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Mann hört auf zu spielen und zuckt mit den Schultern, ein schuldbewusstes Lächeln huscht über sein Gesicht.{/n} "Ich hatte nun schon seit unzähligen Wachschichten keine Arbeit mehr. Und selbst wenn sie mir Arbeit gegeben haben, haben die Enforcers mir danach meinen Verdienst wieder weggenommen. Irgendwann habe ich ein Geschäft nach meinem Geschmack gefunden: Ich tausche Glück gegen Essensmarken. Die Leute hier handeln sowieso mit allem, was sie haben, warum also nicht auch ich?" {n}Die Zuschauer stimmen ihm durch Raunen vorsichtig zu.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The man stops playing and shrugs, a guilty smile crossing his face.{/n} "I haven't had work for who knows how many watches now. And even if they did give me work, the enforcers would just rob me of my earnings afterward. So I've found a calling after my own heart: I trade fortune for ration cards. The folks around here peddle away what little they have to spare, anyway, so why can't I?" {n}The crowd echoes his words in cautious agreement.{/n}

Und selbst wenn sie mir Arbeit gegeben haben, haben die Enforcers mir danach meinen Verdienst wieder weggenommen. Irgendwann habe ich ein Geschäft nach meinem Geschmack gefunden: Ich tausche Glück gegen Essensmarken. Die Leute hier handeln sowieso mit allem, was sie haben, warum also nicht auch ich?" {n}Die Zuschauer stimmen ihm durch Raunen vorsichtig zu.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Adam, flütü çalmayı bırakıp omuz silkiyor. Yüzünde bir anlığına kabahatli bir gülümseme beliriyor.{/n} "Kim bilir kaç vardiyadır çalışacak bir iş bulamadım. Hem bana iş verseler de ardından infazcılar gelip tüm kazandıklarımı elimden alırdı. Ben de yüreğimin sesini dinledim. Kumanya kartları hayrına çalışıyorum. Buradaki insanlar, ellerinde ne var ne yok her şeyin ticaretini yapıyor. Ben neden yapmayayım?" {n}Kendisiyle hemfikir olan kalabalık, sözlerini temkinli bir şekilde tekrarlıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The man stops playing and shrugs, a guilty smile crossing his face.{/n} "I haven't had work for who knows how many watches now. And even if they did give me work, the enforcers would just rob me of my earnings afterward. So I've found a calling after my own heart: I trade fortune for ration cards. The folks around here peddle away what little they have to spare, anyway, so why can't I?" {n}The crowd echoes his words in cautious agreement.{/n}
